short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on "tel:" links to copy phone numbers to your clipboard and automatically paste them into the dialer's input field.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly click on "tel:" links to copy phone numbers to your clipboard and automatically paste them into the dialer's input field. Save time and make phone calls more convenient with this handy extension.
